DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators will evaluate the prebiotic effect of a moderate intake of extra virgin olive oil or red wine on the modulation of gut microbiota composition and the improvement of cardiometabolic factors in obese and lean adults subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Red Wine Polyphenols and Fecal Microbiota
DOC.criteria: Obese patients (body mass index (BMI= or > 30kg/m2) with high insulin resistance (measured by Homeostasis Model Assessment Insulin Resistance Index (HOMAIR) > 5.5. Lean subjects (BMI< 28kg/m2) with low insulin resistance (HOMAIR< 3.3). Exclusion Criteria (all patients): Type 2 diabetes Acute or chronic infection Inflammatory disease or endocrine disorders. History of cancer.
